Must be called with the expected nonce.         The Lit Action includes userNonce in the signed message; this ensures each         signature can only be used once."},"userNonces(address)":{"notice":"Replay protection \u2014 monotonic nonce per user, consumed by Lit Action"}},"notice":"Stores only playlist header + (tracksHash, trackCount, version) in storage.         Full track lists + name/coverCid are emitted in events for the subgraph/frontend.         tracksHash = keccak256(abi.encode(TRACKS_SEED, playlistId, trackIds))         NOTE: name/coverCid are intentionally event-only (not stored in contract state).         coverCid is an IPFS CID for the playlist cover image (\"\" = deterministic/none).","version":1}},"settings":{"compilationTarget":{"src/PlaylistV1.sol":"PlaylistV1"},"evmVersion":"cancun","libraries":{},"metadata":{"bytecodeHash":"ipfs"},"optimizer":{"enabled":true,"runs":1},"remappings":[":@openzeppelin/contracts/=lib/openzeppelin-contracts/contracts/",":erc4626-tests/=lib/openzeppelin-contracts/lib/erc4626-tests/",":forge-std/=lib/forge-std/src/",":halmos-cheatcodes/=lib/openzeppelin-contracts/lib/halmos-cheatcodes/src/",":openzeppelin-contracts/=lib/openzeppelin-contracts/"],"viaIR":true},"sources":{"src/PlaylistV1.sol":{"keccak256":"0xfe87a6610c9a584b98d1622245bacc02c2e101010dafc51a9723104101219e7e","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://3d6713208cfd924668528a9b4e8421ff8698e3906e93b346a2cf432297df05d0","dweb:/ipfs/QmdzzBcSobeMr1s5Vxmh9nZBox1oeMJx1aJS1LfbXRynFF"]}},"version":1}

consumeNonce(address,uint256).notice: Consume a nonce for replay protection. Must be called with the expected nonce.         The Lit Action includes userNonce in the signed message; this ensures each         signature can only be used once.

userNonces(address).notice: Replay protection  monotonic nonce per user, consumed by Lit Action
